title: Global Finance Magazine Names Citi "Best Regional Derivatives Provider" in Latin America for the Third Consecutive Year
summary: Miami, Florida - Citi has been named "Best Regional Derivatives Provider in Latin America" by Global Finance magazine, for the third consecutive year, as part of the ninth annual "World's Best Derivatives Providers" awards for 2013. A full report on the awards will be published in the December issue of the prestigious publication.
tag-1: Global Finance Magazine Names Citi "Best Regional Derivatives Provider" in Latin America for the Third Consecutive Year
tag-2: Miami, Florida – Citi has been named "Best Regional Derivatives Provider in Latin America" by Global Finance magazine, for the third consecutive year, as part of the ninth annual "World's Best Derivatives Providers" awards for 2013. A full report on the awards will be published in the December issue of the prestigious publication.
tag-3: "We are very excited and honored to receive this award in Latin America," said Jaime Roblesgil, Citi Markets Head, Latin America at Citi. "We are committed to continue providing the best derivate services to our clients in the region and the world at the highest standards of excellence."
tag-4: Global Finance's editors based selections primarily on in-depth interviews and email exchanges with end users of derivatives. Among the sources were financial research analysts, traders, risk managers of financial and nonfinancial corporations, as well as portfolio managers of mutual funds and hedge funds, with an emphasis on funds and corporations that have distinguished themselves with relative outperformance since the global financial crisis of 2008.
tag-5: "Regulatory reforms and the emergence of new competitors are transforming the over-the-counter derivatives markets. Our winners are those who have the confidence of their clients as they face unknown challenges ahead," said Joseph Giarraputo, publisher of Global Finance.
tag-6: A variety of subjective and quantitative criteria were used for choosing the winners of the Derivatives Provider awards. Factors considered included: product innovation, the quality of information that providers supply in the process of executing a deal, the breadth of liquid names in which a provider makes markets, a provider's willingness to use its own balance sheet to offer liquidity to a client, and the inclination of a provider to step into the breach in a high-risk situation.
tag-7: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
